attributes.action: Extend driving theory test from expiring during COVID -19 lockdown
attributes.additional_details: This effects not just people doing there car test or there motorbike test this includes everyone doing any type of driving related test, which include a theory. This means if you extend the expiry date by at least a year people will have the opportunity to book there tests again when the first opportunity comes around.
attributes.background: Due to COVID-19 the recurring lockdowns and restrictions have seen a lot of people loose the right to take there driving test due to there theory test being invalid after the expiry date has passed, as they may have had a chance to take there test have had more time.
